overview: "Basmannoe justice" - comedy about the strange fate of sexual intercourse in Russia. Judged by Larry N. Pryanishnikov on charges of making pornography. In the course are all means to inflate the charges in the spirit of Stalin"s shootings initiatives. The movie is exactly recreate the atmosphere in the Russian courts in the early twenty-first century.  There are three scenes plus one hardovye scene minetirovaniya cynical. As of 2008, "Basmannoe justice" - the big-budget film "Strawberries".
title: Basmannoe justice
